name: Burger Shop Mania
description: Looking for a kitchen scramble game? This is what you want! Develop expert Burger skills in Papa's Burger Shop, a gripping Time Management game with cooking different kinds of burgers! Take command of the kitchen and demonstrate the skills of a master chef. Start with simple burgers and work your way to becoming the best known restaurant in the country! You have to speed up your tapping, as the level goes higher the harder it becomes, do it ASAP!
